version_description: • Performance improvements and bug fixes

* MAKE IT RAINBOW with new St. Paddy's Day bills
Swipe for St. Paddy’s Day to fill up the rainbow and get a lucky pot of gold! Bonus golden bills will be awarded when the rainbow meets the pot of gold for a limited time while the St. Paddy's bills are equipped from March 13th to March 23rd.
* Celebrate Pi Day on 3.14 with NEW Pizza Bills
* Improved swiping on iPads
* NEW! Even more stickers
* Bug fixes

St Paddys may be over but you can still enjoy the lucky new bills! Coming soon are new eggs-tra special bills and stickers.
* End St Paddys promotion
* Improved swiping on iPads
* Even more stickers
* Bug fixes

* Spring is coming to Make it Rain with an eggs-cellent peep show! Swipe to crack your egg and hatch the bunnies with new Easter Egg bills.
* Shred Trump’s taxes! Get the special new tax shredder for tax day.
* Bug fixes

Spring has sprung, the eggs have hatched, the taxes have been shredded but you can still enjoy the Spring bills and stickers. Coming soon: a whole new way to make money-- robbery!
- end of Spring promotions
- bug fixes

NEW! Love money match? Play the new Rob the Tower challenge. To steal the treasure, you need to win all five levels in a row. If you lose a level, you lose a life and start back on the ground floor.

* "Rob the Tower" challenge
* bug fixes

* NEW! Love money match? Play the new Rob the Tower challenge. To steal the treasure, you need to win all five levels in a row. If you lose a level, you lose a life and start back on the ground floor.
Rob the Tower will run (all times UTC):
Monday 12:00 AM - Tuesday 12:00 AM
Thursday 12:00 AM - Friday 12:00 AM

* NEW!- Tournament Schedule
We heard you!
Tournaments now run (all times UTC):
Friday 12:00 AM - Monday 12:00 AM
Tuesday 12:00 AM - Thursday 12:00 AM

* Bug Fixes
* Fix to negative spoons on high legacy

Need more money? We've added even more zany bills and exclusive money stickers.
* NEW SPECIAL BILL! Swipe to feed donuts to the Munch Face monster and watch the emoji rain.

Need more money? We've added even more zany bills and exclusive money stickers.
* NEW SPECIAL BILL! Swipe to feed donuts to the Munch Face monster and watch the emoji rain.
* bug fixes

• New and improved interface for investments, boosts, and swapping between your favorite bills.
• New Gold Rush bill! Swipe a pickaxe at the giant gold bearing rock to find the biggest gold nuggets to pile on your fortune. Make a good swipe while digging for gold and Prospector Nugs might appear.
• Even more stickers!!!
• bug fixes

• New and improved interface for investments, boosts, and swapping between your favorite bills.
• New Gold Rush bill! Swipe a pickaxe at the giant gold bearing rock to find the biggest gold nuggets to pile on your fortune. Make a good swipe while digging for gold and Prospector Nugs might appear.
• Even more stickers!!!
• bug fixes

* NEW - TRICK OR TREAT! To celebrate Halloween get your Cash O' Lantern bill. Swipe to carve different faces into the pumpkin and watch the candy cash rain.
* bug fixes

* iPhone X support
* bug fixes

NEW! Finally your dreams can come true to make your cash (almost) real! Get the AR bill and switch to AR mode to swipe bills into the real world and watch the cash pile up. How high can you go?

New! Limited time Snow bills and Fireworks bills!

NEW! Celebrate March Madness with the Baller Bills! Swipe to get the ball into the moving hoop and make it rain!

NEW! SURRENDER EVERYTHING AND EARN EVEN FASTER!
The more you wealth you surrender, the more Gold Shovels you can collect. Gold Shovels increase the rate at which you earn wealth and unlock new upgrades, but you’ll have to surrender your investments, gold vault collection, and cash to get them. The deeper you dig the better the bonus!

Limited Time! Lucky bills! Swipe to fill the rainbow and watch the gold coins rain.

Limited Time! Celebrate Spring with an eggs-cellent peep show! Swipe to crack your egg and hatch the bunnies with Easter Egg bills.

NEW! Who needs a bucket to stockpile cash when you can have a Gold Vault! Collect artifacts to decorate your Gold Vault and increase your cash even faster.

NEW! Crypto mining bills! Swipe to mine those cryptocurrencies!

We heard you! We've added more capacity investments!

NEW! Celebrate March Madness with the Baller Bills! Swipe to get the ball into the moving hoop and make it rain!

NEW! SURRENDER EVERYTHING AND EARN EVEN FASTER!
The more you wealth you surrender, the more Gold Shovels you can collect. Gold Shovels increase the rate at which you earn wealth and unlock new upgrades, but you’ll have to surrender your investments, gold vault collection, and cash to get them. The deeper you dig the better the bonus!

Limited Time! Lucky bills! Swipe to fill the rainbow and watch the gold coins rain.

Limited Time! Celebrate Spring with an eggs-cellent peep show! Swipe to crack your egg and hatch the bunnies with Easter Egg bills.

All new Money Match tournaments! Play each level and get the highest score to win massive prizes!

New Holographic money!
It's Make It Rain's 4th Birthday! Celebrate with the AR money free, a special birthday sale, and special birthday cash!

It's Make It Rain's 4th Birthday! Celebrate with the AR money free, a special birthday sale, and special birthday cash!

*bug fix

It's Make It Rain's 4th Birthday! Celebrate with the AR money free, a special birthday sale, and special birthday cash!
*bug fix

Fireworks money sale!
bug fixes
It is a Cat-astrophy! Cats are hiding everywhere in Make It Rain! Find as many Fat Cats as you can during this limited time event to earn special prizes.

It is a Cat-astrophy! Cats are hiding everywhere in Make It Rain! Find as many Fat Cats as you can during this limited time event to earn special prizes.

*bug fixes
Shaaaaaaarrrk! Sharks are lurking everywhere in Make It Rain! Find as many as you can during this limited time event to earn special prizes. NEW Dark money!
There is a new Dino-mite event just for you. Unearth all the dinosaurs in the Jurrassic Savings event. Get new Stoneage bills, money clips, and more!

New Dino-mite event just for you. Unearth all the dinosaurs in the Jurassic Savings event. Get new Stoneage bills, money clips, and more!
Stability and bug fixes.

New Dino-mite event just for you. Unearth all the dinosaurs in the Jurassic Savings event. Get new Stoneage bills, money clips, and more!
*Stability and bug fixes.

New Dino-mite event just for you! Unearth all the dinosaurs in the Jurassic Savings event. Get the Stone age bills, money clips, and more!
*Stability and bug fixes

Become the Dragon!
Collect dragon eggs to win the dragon's treasure before time runs out.

No tricks! It is time for the Candy Cash event!

Collect the pumpkins to win zombie prizes and treat yourself to the jack-o-lantern money before time runs out.

Become the Dragon!
Collect dragon eggs to win the dragon's treasure before time runs out.

New Dino-mite event just for you! Unearth all the dinosaurs in the Jurassic Savings event. Get the Stone age bills, money clips, and more!
*Stability and bug fixes
Go nuts for donuts in the Donuts Go Crazy event. Challenge yourself to collect as many donuts as you can before the event is over to win sweet prizes.

Become the Dragon!
Collect dragon eggs to win the dragon's treasure before time runs out.

Shaaaaaaarrrk! Sharks are lurking everywhere in Make It Rain! Find as many as you can during this limited time event to earn special prizes.

Limited time lucky St. Paddy's bills! Make it rainbow and shower yourself in gold coins.
Limited time, celebrate March Madness with the Baller Bills! Swipe to get the ball into the moving hoop and make it rain!
Limited Time! Celebrate Spring with an eggs-cellent peep show! Swipe to crack your egg and hatch the bunnies with Easter Egg bills.

It is a Cat-astrophe! Cats are hiding everywhere! Find as many as you can during this limited time event to earn special prizes.

It's Make It Rain's Birthday! Celebrate with infinite cake!
Its dino-mite time! Get rich quick by unearthing all the dinosaurs in the Jurassic Treasure event. Swipe the stone age bills, hatch the dino egg, and more!

No tricks! It is time for the Candy Cash event! Collect the candies to win delicious prizes.

Limited time! Treat yourself to some undead treasure before Halloween is over.
Bug fixes

Penguin frenzy! Penguins are here so collect cookies to win cool prizes.

Limited time! Spend that holiday cash in our end of the year sale! You can Make it Reindeer with Santa, Make it Snow, or celebrate with Fireworks.

Celebrate Lunar New Year with big dragon energy! Find as many dragons as you can to earn special prizes.

Limited time Year of the Ox red envelopes! Limited time Valentines money!
Bug fixes

It is a Cat-astrophe! Cats are hiding everywhere! Find as many as you can during this limited time event to earn special prizes.

Limited time lucky St. Paddy's bills! Make it rainbow and shower yourself in gold coins.
Limited time, celebrate March Madness with the Baller Bills! Swipe to get the ball into the moving hoop and make it rain!
Limited time! Celebrate Spring with an eggs-cellent peep show! Swipe to crack your egg and hatch the bunnies with Easter Egg bills.

Go nuts for donuts in the Donuts Go Crazy event. Challenge yourself to collect as many donuts as you can before the event is over to win sweet prizes.
It's Make It Rain's Birthday! Celebrate with infinite cake!
The Rainbow Bill is out for June!
